text: Hypericum kiboense is a flowering plant the family Hypericaceae, section Adenosepalum, subsection Adenosepalum.Studies in the genus Hypericum L. (Guttiferae) 6. Sections 20. Myriandra to 28. Elodes ==Description== The species is a shrub that grows to be 2.5 m tall with orange or red stems. Its flowers are golden and tinged red and are 15–20 mm in diameter.Hypericum MySpecies Retrieved 9/6/16 ==Distribution== Hypericum kiboense is found in Uganda, Kenya, and North TanzaniaGBIF Online Retrieved 9/6/16 ==References== kiboense Category:Flora of Kenya Category:Flora of Tanzania Category:Flora of Uganda Category:Taxa named by Daniel Oliver
title: Hypericum kiboense
